Package engine.objects

Class PlaneObject

java.lang.Object
engine.objects.Object
engine.objects.PlaneObject
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameEngineObject
public class PlaneObject extends Object implements GameEngineObject
The PlaneObject class represents a 2D plane object in the simulation. It extends the Object class and initializes its own mesh and texture.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    PlaneObject()
    Constructor for the PlaneObject class.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    createMesh()
    Creates the mesh for the plane object with vertex positions, texture coordinates, and indices.
    void
    init()
    Initializes the plane object by creating a mesh and setting its position, rotation, and scale.
    void
    render()
    Renders the plane object by binding the texture and mesh, then drawing the elements using OpenGL.

    getMesh, getPosition, getRotation, getScale, getTexture, setMesh, setPosition, setRotation, setScale, setTexture

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
